text: Melanodrymia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Melanodrymiidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Melanodrymia include: * Melanodrymia aurantiaca Hickman, 1984 * Melanodrymia brightae Warén & Bouchet, 1993 * Melanodrymia galeronae Warén & Bouchet, 2001 ==References== Category:Melanodrymiidae
title: Melanodrymia
